title: PSA: If you're CS is shit, you're probably not going to get an S
body:
Cool, your score was 11-2-8. Good job! But, if you have 3.8 cs/min, a total of 4 wards placed, and took 0 towers, you aren't getting an S. It's League, not Call of Duty team deathmatch.

So PLEASE stop spamming the boards with your matches.

Edit: Yes, it's your. I had a different title and didn't double check after changing some of it.

Edit 2: I'm tired of seeing the "But I think getting kills and carrying the team is more important than afk farming." Nobody said it wasn't. CS isn't the only factor. But, you are judged against other players playing that champion/role. So, if you're playing some stupid easy pubstomp champ (riven), you getting a lot of kills is not that impressive. As a lot of players do that. The difference is, those other players get a lot of kills AND a lot of CS. That's why they get the S and you don't. If someone else does everything you do, AND then gets a lot cs, you aren't going to be given the highest rating.

Edit 3: Supports. You are judged against other supports. So no, not getting cs as Janna doesn't screw your rating. Nice memes, though.

Edit 4: This is an example. As you see here, the Ashe has the highest KDA, the most damage dealt in the game, the most wards placed in the game, and still manages to have 10 cs/min. That is an S performance. If you don't do everything well, you are not going to get your S. Since there are players that do everything well in some games.
http://i.imgur.com/DlqU0lJ.png

replies.body:
I just had a game where {{champion:236}} intentionally avoided teamfights for 90% of the game and instead solo farmed CS and only got kills by cleaning up fights that were already finished, came in 3rd place for team damage and ended 6/4. Meanwhile our 15/5 {{champion:6}}  hard carried the entire team, started every fight, did the most damage, etc. but spent more time helping the team than freeze-farming minions.

Guess who got the S- and who got the A?

{{champion:33}} Snowballs every lane, bails out teammates from chases, dies for the success of the teamfight, wards as much as the reliable support, Tanks tower shots for dives, shows up for every dragon, stole baron, Body blocks Cait ult twice
8/8/24 
CS: 127
A

{{champion:21}} Lands one good ult, shows up for 3 out of the 10 teamfights, only has bot turret participation. 5 out of 7 kills are clean up or pure kill steal, positions poorly, literally just drops wards to drop them
7/2/1
CS: 387
S

{{champion:21}} You should really work on dying less Rammus

{{champion:33}} (remembers all the times he bailed her out) .........................OK [internal screaming]
the system is automated. its not a human. though they could improve it a lot. its never gonna count intangibles obviously.

ill disagree a bit with that one. Soloq often times goes around strenght floor and strenght ceilings. The issue is that even tho leblanc had 47% win rate, she never was getting buffed because of competitive concensus about her. So they nerfed her ceiling a bit instead and buffed her floor.  But Azir IS the best exemple of a champ that is shit soloQ but will never be buffed cause of his competitive nature.

So let me quote you on how you said ryze was weak and shit and he's not a new champion on another post you said he's old? 

Also, 50% winrate in plat is balanced. P/brate? It's not even high. SOLOQ DOESN'T EXIST, GODDAMN IT STOP IT.Riot, where is the block option on the boards?

{{champion:67}} Wtf Sona why are you taking my farm?
{{champion:37}} _I NEED THAT S!!!_
Vayne can buy {{item:3222}} and {{item:3190}} and get healing and shielding stats and will get S+ as Vayne support. All are happy. :D
..What if Sona queues as ADC and Vayne queues as support and they trade? Is that an auto-S for the Vayne basically?
This is a problem though, because if you are doing that good, you aren't going to be able to CS so well. Personally, I think being 11-2-8 is more important than 3.8 cs/min.

If you were watching c9 vs nv right now, Jensen went 14/2/6, and still managed 350 cs in a 38 minute game. Yes, you should be able to maintain farm while playing the macro game. It's part of playing well. If you can't do both, you don't deserve an S.

Jensen is:

1) a pro and the .0001%

2) On a team that works together, practices together and is 100% into trying to win

Extremely different from normal play. It's not say he's not good at League, but it's apples to oranges.

my point was you can get a lot of kills while maintaining farm, you just have to know when to roam for kills, when to group up, and when to keep farming. If you learn how to keep up with CS throughout the entire game, you'll improve your gameplay a lot.
Jensen's team gives him the lane farm wherever they're pushing because hes their carry.

Except it's not a problem. 16 cs is about worth a kill in gold. So 11 kills is about 176 cs difference. If the game is 30 mins, 3.8cs/min is 114 cs. Now say someone had good cs, say 9/min. That's 270 cs. That's 156 cs difference. If someone has that many cs at 30 mins, they probably have at least 1 kill, making their gold equal. It's about gold, not kills.
CS is important but it isn't everything.

You would be wrong. 100 CS is roughly the same as 6 kills. It is also the vast majority of your XP. It also means you are pushing lanes to take more objectives. CS is more important than ARAMing the entire game
This isn't CoD? Time to stop maining gun champs...

What if we play a support without {{item:3302}} and we can't CS or take kills because we aren't allowed to? What happens then?

I swear this system discriminates us support mains more than anyone else. 

_Almighty._
The system takes into account if you're support or not. I play nami and I've gotten a lot of S without a shitton of Cs.
They just edited the system to be kinder towards supports since they don't CS

> Edit 3: Supports. You are judged against other supports. So no, not getting cs as Janna doesn't screw your rating. Nice memes, though.

Actually, as a Janna main, this is not true. You have to have roughly 50 farm and a decent score for an S.

I get an S in like 85% of my games as Ekko and I usually only get like ~6 cs per minute when laning and around 4 as a jungler.
